channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2024090202
item.description:
Report E-2024090202

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-13T09:14:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-30
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: When picking drum up at the customer the driver failed to make sure the bungs were tight and when tipping drum over on the dolly liquids started dripping from the bung. The driver did not notice the leek until he had made it to his truck and noticed the little trail left behind. We had a crew come out to the facility and due a thorough cleaning of the material from the floor and disposing of the absorbents used in the appropriate manner.
